# hidesWhenNotPressed

**Instance Property**

Whether to hide the thumbstick when it is not being pressed.

## Declaration

```swift
var hidesWhenNotPressed: Bool { get set }
```

## Inspecting the descriptor

- **backgroundContents**: The contents for the background of the thumbstick.
- **highlightDuration**: The time it takes for a highlight to fade away, in seconds.
- **label**: The label associated with the thumbstick.
- **offset**: The control’s offset from the anchor, which determines its position.
- **size**: The size (width, height) of the thumbstick in points.
- **stickContents**: The contents for the thumbstick itself.
- **stickSize**: The size (width, height) of the thumbstick stick itself in points.
- **zIndex**: The z-index of the thumbstick. A lower z-index is drawn first.
